程序包的使用
net.minecraftforge.common

  • 使用net.minecraftforge.common的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    net.minecraft.block  
    net.minecraft.entity.item  
    net.minecraft.entity.monster  
    net.minecraft.entity.passive  
    net.minecraft.item  
    net.minecraft.world  
    net.minecraft.world.gen.layer  
    net.minecraftforge.client.gui  
    net.minecraftforge.common  
    net.minecraftforge.common.network  
    net.minecraftforge.debug.item  
    net.minecraftforge.server.command  
  • net.minecraft.block使用的net.minecraftforge.common中的类 
    类和说明
    EnumPlantType 
    IPlantable 
    IShearable
    This allows for mods to create there own Shear-like items and have them interact with Blocks/Entities without extra work.
  • net.minecraft.entity.item使用的net.minecraftforge.common中的类 
    类和说明
    IMinecartCollisionHandler
    This class defines a replacement for the default minecart collision code.
  • net.minecraft.entity.monster使用的net.minecraftforge.common中的类 
    类和说明
    IShearable
    This allows for mods to create there own Shear-like items and have them interact with Blocks/Entities without extra work.
  • net.minecraft.entity.passive使用的net.minecraftforge.common中的类 
    类和说明
    IShearable
    This allows for mods to create there own Shear-like items and have them interact with Blocks/Entities without extra work.
  • net.minecraft.item使用的net.minecraftforge.common中的类 
    类和说明
    EnumPlantType 
    IPlantable 
    IRarity
    Interface generalisation of EnumRarity.
  • net.minecraft.world使用的net.minecraftforge.common中的类 
    类和说明
    ForgeChunkManager.Ticket 
  • net.minecraft.world.gen.layer使用的net.minecraftforge.common中的类 
    类和说明

    BiomeManager.BiomeType 
  • net.minecraftforge.client.gui使用的net.minecraftforge.common中的类 
    类和说明
    ForgeVersion.Status 
  • net.minecraftforge.common使用的net.minecraftforge.common中的类 
    类和说明
    BiomeDictionary.BiomeInfo 
    BiomeDictionary.Type 
    BiomeManager.BiomeEntry 
    BiomeManager.BiomeType 
    BiomeManager.TrackedList 
    DimensionManager.Dimension 
    DungeonHooks.DungeonMob 
    EnumPlantType 
    ForgeChunkManager.ChunkEntry 
    ForgeChunkManager.LoadingCallback
    All mods requiring chunkloading need to implement this to handle the re-registration of chunk tickets at world loading time
    ForgeChunkManager.Ticket 
    ForgeChunkManager.Type 
    ForgeHooks.LootTableContext
